7 Feet Light Up Inflatable Christmas Snowman Blow Up Decorations Outdoor Yard

Just plug in, wait a few minutes, you will get a lovely Xmas inflatable snowman. It came with stakes to secure in the ground, rope, and sand bags, you don’t have to worry about the christmas inflatables be blew away by the strong wind.Great addition to your front lawn anf yard and attracts the attention of guests and neighbors.

Instruction:
1.Close the zipper on the side.
2.Screw the adapter tightly before usage.
3.Make sure the fan not be blocked.
4.Plug in the adapter

Attention:
1. Don’t cover the fan when using.
2. Don’t inflate during storms or strong winds.
3. Protect fan and power cord from water, fire and severe weather.
4. Avoid be pricked by sharp tools when inflating.
【CHRISTMAS INFLATABLE】LED lights built-in Christmas inflatable snowman, open arms and hug your family and neighbors, light up and make your yard a big hit around neighbors.
【COLORFUL & ROTATING】Built in pure LED Light and colored rotative LED light which projects “Merry Christmas” adds a strong Christmas atmosphere to your yard,which will surely win the praise of children.
【STABLE DESIGN】The blow up snowman is equipped with ground stakes and tethers to ensure it can stand steadily. And internal sandbags for extra stability,the Christmas snowman can remain safe and stable even in high winds.
【HIGH QUALITY & DURABLE】Made of high-density waterproof polyester, the christmas inflatable is wear-resistant.Great for indoor, outdoor, party, stage prop and more.
【FAST & FULLY AUTOMATIC】This christmas blow up yard decorations is easy to install. Just plug in,you can get a plump snowman in a few minutes. Ideal for outdoor, home, party, yard, garden, lawn, patio, porch decoration.

Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 13:55:36 UTC – Details)

360 Swivel Base: This tablet mount comes with a 360° rotatable axis connecting with the base, allowing you to swivel your device to any angle, which makes it easy to adjust at the right angle and show the program to your work partner.
foldable & portable: This adjustable cell phone holder is designed to be used anywhere. The size of the fold-up mode is 4.72*4.72*1.18-inch(MAX) and it weighs 174g. Just fold it then you can carry it to coffee shops, airplanes, treadmills, or wherever you go.
Wide Compatibility: This stand is widely compatible with all tablet pads and cellphones (suggest in 4-13 inches). Such as iPad Mini 6, iPhone 13, Galaxy Z, iPad Air 4, iPad 2017 Pro 9.7 / 10.5, Surface Go, Surface 3, Galaxy Tab, Kindle, Nexus, E-reader, etc.

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:33:32 UTC – Details)

Product Description

INDOOR/OUTDOOR USE – The LED snowflake lights projector is made of ABS and designed with IP44 waterproof, making it durable in a certain degree of rain and snow. For outdoor use, the light show projector can be connected to the ground stake and a 16.4FT long power cord is equipped, while for indoor use, it can be attached to the mounting base.
MULTI-FUNCTION RF REMOTE – The RF remote control for the snowflake projector lights provides a more extensive operational range and easier operation way. You can alter the speed of the snowflake movement and flash at will, as well as set a 2/4/6 hour timer. To save energy, the holiday projector light will automatically switch off after 6 hours of work, but you can restart it.
FOR IMPORTANT MOMENTS – We recommend setting the Christmas projector at a distance of 10 to 25 feet from the projection surface for enhanced brightness and visibility. It can be widely used to celebrate important moments such as Christmas, birthdays, and family reunions and also used as fantastic decoration lighting for bedrooms, living rooms, yard, gardens, and more.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – Not only products but also professional after-sales service. If you aren’t happy with the Christmas projector lights outdoor when you receive them, please do not hesitate to contact us for assistance. Our service team will respond within 12 hours to resolve any issue.
